description: Team Warrior`s green haired gun-toting maniac. Maya is about the same height as Rio with relatively the same body measurements. She is Team Warrior`s primary sniper and gun user. She mainly joined to shoot as much as she wanted, which causes problems because she doesn`t get to shoot that much... which in many cases leads her to feeling something akin to sexual frustration. To her, the bigger the gun the better, no matter whatever gun she uses she`ll find some satisfaction (sexual or otherwise). Many times Maya is overheard saying that if she doesn`t get to shoot more, she`ll quit the police and become a mercenary.
name: Jingu Maya
